name: Unilyte
overview: A ROM hack of Blizzard, a separate release with different credited developers. Hall of Light has this to say, "The crackers' scene is and was always inventive! So there exists a game entitled "UNILYTE", which is nothing else but the shareware version of Blizzard with a brand new title screen, with the programming, graphics and sound credited to three completely fictitious people!" This is a horizontally scrolling space shooter released in 1988.
